text:
Policy Name: HealthCare Plus Plan
Sum Insured: Rs.5,00,000
Key Coverage:
- Inpatient hospitalization up to the sum insured
- Pre and post-hospitalization expenses: 30 and 60 days respectively
- Ambulance charges up to Rs.2,000 per hospitalization
- Day care treatments covered
- Domiciliary hospitalization up to 10% of sum insured
Exclusions:
- Pre-existing diseases covered after 3 years waiting period
- No coverage for cosmetic or dental treatments unless due to accident
- Maternity and newborn coverage starts only after 2 policy years
Other Details:
- Room rent limit: Single private AC room
- Co-payment: 10% for all claims if insured is over 60
- Free annual health check-up after 1 claim-free year
